On 2/14/07, Nic James Ferrier <nferrier@...> wrote:
>  I was doing some openid hacking the other day with python's urllib2 -
>  supposedly quite a modern HTTP tool. Frankly I'd rather have slammed
>  my fingers in a door. It was a deeply unpleasant experience.

In a shameless bit of self-promotion, you should
really be using httplib2:

   http://bitworking.org/projects/httplib2/

   -joe

--
